snippet: Vitaly Borker, who terrified customers of his online eyewear store, DecorMyEyes, was sentenced to four years in federal prison and ordered to pay $100,000.
abstract: Vitaly Borker, who terrified customers of his online eyewear store DecorMyEyes with threats of violence, including rape, is sentenced to four years in federal prison and ordered to pay $100,000.
lead_paragraph: Vitaly Borker, who terrified customers of his online eyewear store, DecorMyEyes, was sentenced to four years in federal prison and ordered to pay $100,000.

headline.seo: Vitaly Borker, Owner of DecorMyEyes, Sentenced for Threats to Customers
